description: Try our easy to follow Rich Smoked Salmon Croustades recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Rich Smoked Salmon Croustades Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the crème fraîche and horseradish. Season with salt and pepper. Refrigerate for 30 minutes.
Fill each croustade basket with a spoonful of the crème fraîche mixture, twist a swirl of smoked salmon on top, and top that with a little caviar. Serve within 1 hour.
